text: Woh aisay hain jo tauba kerney walay ibadat kerney walay hamd kerney walay roza rakhney walay (yaa raah-e-haq mein safar kerney walay) rukoo aur sajda kerney walay nek baaton ki taleem kerney walay aur buri baaton say baaz rakhney walay aur Allah ki haddon ka khayal rakhney walay hain aur aisay momineen ko aap khushkhabri suna dijiye
